EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance: Giants vs Rockies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us next week on Tuesday, September 19th, as the San Francisco Giants take on the Colorado Rockies. We have limited seats left, so reserve your spot and enjoy an evening of food, drinks, and baseball on us. One lucky attendee will even walk home with an Nintendo Switch. San Francisco Giants vs Colorado Rockies <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
Where: AT&T Park 24 Willie Mays Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94107 Thursday, September 19th 7:12pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>
Last Chance - RSVP Today <[[https://turbonomic.com/san-francisco-community-appreciation-giants-vs-rockies/]]>!
Please reach out to megan.gay@turbonomic.com or your account executives for any further questions.
We can't wait to see you there!
Cheers,
Your friends at Turbonomic
